node.statement: CASE 1 SETUP - Assume g_1(B) = B. By Lemma 11.3 (tail in block implies support in block): Since a_1 is in B and g_1(B) = B, we conclude supp(g_1) = {1, 3, 4, 6, a_1, ..., a_n} is contained in B. EXPLICIT CONTENTS: B now contains at minimum {1, 3, 4, 6, a_1, ..., a_n}. In particular, the core points 1, 3, 4, 6 are all in B.
